Fields.DestinationPath-Help: The path where the file will be copied too
Fields.CopyFolder-Help: If the relative library folder structure should be copied too

Fields.Extensions-Help:
A list of case insensitive file extensions that will be matched against.
Ouput 1 equals a match
Output 2 equals not a match

Fields.Lower-Help: The value it must bet greater than
Fields.Upper-Help: The value it must be less than. Leave as 0 to not test the upper limit.

Fields.DestinationPath-Help: The path where the file will be moved too
Fields.MoveFolder-Help: If the relative library folder structure should be copied too
Fields.DeleteOriginal-Help: If the original file should be deleted, this will only happen if the working file is different to the original file
